biblio_publisher: State of NSW Dept. of Education and Training
description: Summary: "The Red dragonfly mathematics challenge is an English adaptation of a classic Japanese mathematics problem-solving book. It provides a range of easily understood problems to challenge and stimulate student interest and reward perseverance. All the challenges have been used in primary classrooms and emphasise essential algebraic reasoning." NSW Department of Education and Training website, viewed 17/6/2011.
title: Red Dragonfly Mathematics Challenge
